name: Emotionally Unstable
description:
A game for Ludum Dare 49. Theme: Unstable

Balance happiness, sadness and your life time which is running out.

Instructions: The value on left top corner is happiness and right top corner is sadness. You have to keep these below 100. Left bottom corner is how much the accessory changes your health, which you must keep as high as possible. Health also runs out as time goes on. The value in right bottom corner is your progress to next level which you want to be high as possible. There is reroll button to get new options in the center but it has a cooldown so don’t waste it.

Eveything made by me.

Code: Javascript with PixiJs.

Art: Procreate.

Music:

https://tinyurl.com/ydr2afb4

Numbers in cards are a bit random, as I didn't have enough time.
